title: Rising Front
description: Rising Front is a massive WW1 shooter centered around trench warfare It features a perfect blend of FPS, RTS and battle simulator The goal for this game is to accurately simulate WW1 battles with hundreds or even thousands of units on the battlefield. Battle Size. This game is capable of running 1000+ units making for incredible battles never seen before in a WW1 game Bio Prototype

game_info.Genre: Action, Casual, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
